ModMetadata.Name: StationeersAddonsExample
ModMetadata.Author: Erdroy
ModMetadata.Description:
WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons ---
This mod serves to demonstrate the correct format of a custom mod folder for Stationeers with scripting/content support.
